Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ALGSStartGame
    This is an Action Listener permitting to start an Offline Game.
    ALGSStartOnlineGame
    This is an Action Listener permitting to start an Online Game.
    GameSession
    This class for let the user set its game preferences in one place.
    GameSessionAISelect
    This class is the panel for asking for AI type opponents in an Offline game.
    GameSessionBasic
    This class for lauching the correct game (Online/Offline) depending on the parameters.
    GameSessionServerSettings
    This class for graphically let the user connect to a distant server and play the game.
    HumanPlayerUI
    This class for displaying the GUI control for human player.
    HumanUI
    This class for displaying the GUI board.
    Ringzz
    This class for launching the Ringgz GUI to permit to host a game or play the game.
    ServerSession
    This class for maintening the Server of the Ringgz game for playing in network.
